title: The Auslesen Seven In The Land of The Unicorn
description: Little did young Chris know that he was no ordinary boy. When a chance encounter with a convicted criminal reveals his magical origins, he and his friend James find themselves surrounded in a world filled with magic beyond human imagination. A captivating mixture of fun-filled magic and Greek mythology awaits you with the first installment of Schmitz´s enchanting saga. Join the exciting adventures of a group of young wizards as they come face-to-face with Dragons and gods from Mount Olympus - in their quest to capture Aphrodite´s unicorn.
author: Zachary T.M. Schmitz
